Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura made his NBA debut but did not score any points, missing both 3-point attempts and committing a turnover.
Ja Morant encouraged Kawamura to shoot more, emphasizing the need for him to contribute offensively.
Post-Match Reflections: Kawamura expressed excitement about his debut and his desire to keep improving.
Ja Morant praised Kawamura's play but urged him to score his first NBA points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kawamura is the second Japanese player to play for the Memphis Grizzlies, following Yuta Watanabe.
